title: Didnt get my mastery token...

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I got my S rank in this game however i didn't get my mastery token.. am i misunderstanding the rank system or something?
My friend is working on rank 6 nid and he got his mastery token no problem getting S rank, my understanding is your need rank S- or higher.

replies.body:
There are a number of factors that must be met in order to earn a Mastery token.

The first, as *Zombiemaster* mentioned, is that it must be in a normal or ranked SR 5v5 match. Next, you must earn an S-grade (S- or higher for level 6, S or S+ for level 7) for your champion that you're already level 5 mastery or higher with.

Check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for more info on how this works and please let me know if you have any questions.
Unfortunately, you are not able to earn mastery tokens when playing Twisted Treeline. You can only earn them for normal or ranked Summoner's Rift matches.
